name: Knights of Grumthorr - Mobile Edition
description:
A medieval battle toy for two players on the same device.

Each person can choose their army, deploy it and then fight it out with each other on either phone or tablet.

The game does not use a network connection but rather both players watch the battle unfold on a single device that you both use.

Watch Knights, Archers and Spearman fight it out over the grassy plains.

Can be used for resolving battles in story based pen and paper campaigns or similar type situations.

Source code can be found here:

https://mattiesgames.com/assets/kogchess/source.php

**NEW** - A port to Windows PC has been made from the Android version. It is basically the same game but runs on Windows as well.
